Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Tigecycline (0.12-8 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Tigecycline for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive bacteria, specifically for testing Tigecycline.
